question: One mole of an ideal monoatomic gas is taken round the cyclic process MNOM. The work done by the gas is
images/f6a1b2c3-d4e5-4f6a-3b4c-567890123467.png
explanation: Work done is the area enclosed by the cycle in the P-V diagram.
Area of triangle = (1/2) × Base × Height = (1/2) × (3V₀ - V₀) × (3P₀ - P₀).
